game.name: Space Bash
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A chaotic local party game where tiny spaceships blast, bump, and battle through wild arenas — from survival to soccer to space billiards!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A chaotic local party game where tiny spaceships blast, bump, and battle through wild arenas — from survival to soccer to space billiards!
